accesspoint.title: Access Point
accesspoint.description: Create a wifi access point. You can use this to create a wifi relay or to directly connect to The Box.

mpd.title: MPD
mpd.description:
Listen to your music on The Box. You can find informations on MPD here.

You'll need an MPD client to control the music. There are many available MPD clients for Android, IOS or for your computer. For Android I recommend MPDroid, it's free.

As an alternative you can enable the MPD GUI to control the music from your browser.

upnpdlna.title: UPNP / DLNA
upnpdlna.description:
Play your media on your external devices. You can find informations about UPNP here and DLNA here.

You can access your media with VLC or there is plenty of software that can access UPNP/DLNA server.
